definition: words from the bottom of one's heart

sentences.english: The clinical data of 36 cases of severe pulmonary contusion was reviewed.
sentences.chinese: 对36例严重肺挫伤患者的临床资料进行回顾性分析。

sentences.english: The pulmonary vasculitis and Raynaud phenomenon might be related to immunologic abnormalities.
sentences.chinese: 认为肺血管的病变及雷诺现象可能与免疫异常有关。

sentences.english: Xenon lung scans may be helpful in the early diagnosis of inhalation injury.
sentences.chinese: 氚肺扫描可能有助于早期诊断吸入性损伤。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the effective therapy of acute injury of lung caused by indirect cause morbi.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨间接病因致急性肺损伤的治疗。

sentences.english: And the inhaling steroids compliance and lung function were compared.
sentences.chinese: 并观察依从性与哮喘肺功能改善的关系。

sentences.english: Objective To enhance the knowledge of pulmonary aspergilloma on CT and chest radiography.
sentences.chinese: 目的提高对肺曲菌球CT和胸片表现的认识。

sentences.english: Swimming A Fort Lauderdale swimmer releases the air in his lungs underwater.
sentences.chinese: 劳德戴尔堡垒游泳者在水下面释放他肺中的空气。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the diagnosis and treatment of pulmonary contusion.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨严重肺挫伤的诊断及治疗方法。

sentences.english: Interstitial lung disease has been observed in patients with abnormal suggested that it should.
sentences.chinese: 间质性肺疾病已观察到异常的患者易瑞沙。

sentences.english: Hyperbaric oxygen exposure is probably the most accepted model of oxidative lung injury.
sentences.chinese: 高压氧仓被公认为氧化肺损伤的重要模式。

sentences.english: It made my blood boil to see my son stealing money from my wallet.
sentences.chinese: 我看见我儿子从我钱包里偷钱，肺都气炸了。

sentences.english: The lung is made up of numerous secondary pulmonary lobules .
sentences.chinese: 此肺显示大量正常的次级肺小叶。

sentences.english: Wenzel noted that the drug had no effect on lung capacity or general symptoms.
sentences.chinese: 温泽博士指出，该药对肺容量或一般症状没有影响。

sentences.english: Histologically they looked like the embryonic lung consisted of epithelial and mesenchymal elements.
sentences.chinese: 由上皮及间叶两个胚叶构成，状似胚胎肺。

sentences.english: Lastly a rolling ball technique was used to remedy the crack and gap in the lung boundary.
sentences.chinese: 最后通过滚球法弥合肺边缘的裂缝及缺口。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical character of congenital pulmonary hypoplasia.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨先天性肺发育不全的临床特征。

definition: five viscera of TCM, namely: heart 心[xin1], liver 肝[gan1], spleen 脾[pi2], lungs 肺[fei4] and kidneys 腎|肾[shen4]

(TCM) six bowels (hollow organs), namely: gall bladder 膽|胆[dan3], stomach 胃[wei4], large intestine 大腸|大肠[da4 chang2], small intestine 小腸|小肠[xiao3 chang2], triple heater 三焦[san1 jiao1], bladder 膀胱[pang2 guang1]
